title: Autumnal Manor Ambience and Music | fantasy ambience of a manor in a fantasy forest with a stream
description:
Autumn came early into the valley. The trees around the manor turned amber and the air here smelled different. The season was finally changing.

***

Credits:
Music: mine
Picture: https://www.deviantart.com/refiend
Effects: https://www.videezy.com/
All my music is copyrighted and cannot be used without permission. Do you want to use my work in your project? For more information about licensing: https://www.martiasmuses.com/licensing/

Software, hardware and websites I am using (and recommend):

Pixabay for free pictures: https://pixabay.com/
Distrokid for distributing music: https://distrokid.com/vip/seven/3258222 (7% off with this link)
Editing videos (free version): DaVinci Resolve
Sound library (has free version): https://www.zapsplat.com/?aff=194
Recording and editing music (also free): Cakewalk and Audacity

Headphones: https://amzn.to/3Kr3uIA
Midi Controller: https://amzn.to/4aMcZNh

***

Martia üêã
I create ambiences with original music. My favorite genre is fantasy, but I sometimes venture into sci-fi, horror, history, or plain (but beautiful) natural settings.
I am heavily inspired by books, as I am a total bookworm, by PC games and DnD which my husband loves and talks about. I love long cross-country hikes, that feel like a huge adventure and you can see it in the number of traveling ambiences I produce üòÄ

***

You are at the right place if you are looking for ambient music for reading, writing, or work, or background music for DnD.

#ambientmusic #fantasyambience

Disclaimer: This description contains affiliate links. If you purchase using these links, I earn a small commission.
